task: Plot the "tavg", "tmin", and "tmax" columns from the "data" DataFrame using the "plt" library. Display the resulting plot.
context:
from meteostat import Daily
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from datetime import datetime
# Time period
start = datetime(2018, 1, 1)
end = datetime(2018, 12, 31)
# Get daily data
data = Daily('10637', start, end)
# Group & aggregate weekly
data = data.normalize().aggregate(freq='1W').fetch()
